msbt.message: Everyone's working up a huge sweat trying to find all the different kinds of eggs, .Those calories aren't gonna know what hit 'em!
You met Zipper yet? The way he's always dancing I've GOTTA find out what his endurance routine is!
Bunny Day is the ultimate fitness test. You're shaking trees, you're digging holes, you're fishingIt's like having and and all rolled into one!

So this is weird I was doing my morning boulder-lift, same as always, and a stone egg popped out.Then, for my afternoon boulder-lift I went on a Nook Miles Ticket tour, and I got even MORE stone eggs!I think I'm just gonna lay off the boulder-lifts for a bit,

Have wood eggs been falling out of fruit trees when you hit 'em lately? I wanna make sure it's not just me.Coconut trees are the worst. Or best, if you're after something other than a post-workout coconut to snack on.
Bunny Day's coming up! You ready? You psyched? 'Cause will be here before you know it!
